code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ChatList(){const[buddies,setBuddies]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:3000/buddies").then(response=>{if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}return response.json();}).then(data=>setBuddies(data)).catch(error=>{console.error("Error fetching data:",error);setError(error.message);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Chat Buddies"}),error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error loading buddies: ",error]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:buddies.map(buddy=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/profile/${buddy.id}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:buddy.profilePic,alt:buddy.name}),buddy.name]})},buddy.id))})]});}export default ChatList;
